summary: Completed comprehensive testing of hackathon website with all user roles and core functionality working properly

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay prevents clicking on background elements during judge/criteria creation

passed_tests: Admin dashboard navigation and timer management
Judge dashboard access and leaderboard viewing
Team login with team name and common password
Team profile management (leader, members, project details)
Team score display (when scored by judges)
Marine theme styling (dark ocean colors, cyan accents)
Responsive design on desktop and mobile
All API endpoints returning correct status codes
JWT authentication working across all user roles
MongoDB data persistence for all entities
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in admin dashboard - ensure modals can be properly closed to allow navigation to other tabs without page refresh
